br.com.neppo.cache

Interface Cache<K,V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryCache, Memcached

    public interface Cache<K,V>
    A Cache efficiently stores temporary objects primarily to improve an application's performance.
    Author:
    bhlangonijr

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clear all entries from the cache.
      void close()
      Close and release de resources for current cache instance
      V get(K key)
      Returns the Cached value stored under the specified key or null if there is no Cache entry for that key.
      V getAndTouch(K key, int ttl)
      Returns the Cached value stored under the specified key or null if there is no Cache entry for that key.
      void put(K key, V value)
      Adds a Cache entry.
      void put(K key, V value, int ttl)
      Adds a Cache entry.
      V putAndGet(K key, V value)
      Adds a Cache entry and return the previous value.
      V putAndGet(K key, V value, int ttl)
      Adds a Cache entry and return the previous value.
      V remove(K key)
      Remove the cache entry corresponding to the specified key.
      int size()
      Returns the number of entries in the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        V get(K key)
      throws CacheException
        Returns the Cached value stored under the specified key or null if there is no Cache entry for that key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key that the value was previous added with
        Returns:
        the cached object or null if there is no entry for the specified key
        Throws:
        CacheException - if there is a problem accessing the underlying cache system

      • getAndTouch

        V getAndTouch(K key,
            int ttl)
              throws CacheException
        Returns the Cached value stored under the specified key or null if there is no Cache entry for that key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key that the value was previous added with
        ttl - time to live
        Returns:
        the cached object or null if there is no entry for the specified key
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • putAndGet

        V putAndGet(K key,
          V value)
            throws CacheException
        Adds a Cache entry and return the previous value.
        Parameters:
        key - the key used to identify the object being stored.
        value - the value to be stored in the cache.
        Returns:
        the previous value associated with the given key or null if there was previous value
        Throws:
        CacheException - if there is a problem accessing the underlying cache system

      • putAndGet

        V putAndGet(K key,
          V value,
          int ttl)
            throws CacheException
        Adds a Cache entry and return the previous value.
        Parameters:
        key - the key used to identify the object being stored.
        value - the value to be stored in the cache.
        ttl - time-to-live for the entry
        Returns:
        the previous value associated with the given key or null if there was previous value
        Throws:
        CacheException - if there is a problem accessing the underlying cache system

        void put(K key,
       V value)
         throws CacheException
        Adds a Cache entry.
        Parameters:
        key - the key used to identify the object being stored.
        value - the value to be stored in the cache.

      • put

        void put(K key,
       V value,
       int ttl)
         throws CacheException
        Adds a Cache entry.
        Parameters:
        key - the key used to identify the object being stored.
        value - the value to be stored in the cache.
        ttl - time-to-live for the entry
        Throws:
        CacheException - if there is a problem accessing the underlying cache system

      • remove

        V remove(K key)
         throws CacheException
        Remove the cache entry corresponding to the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the entry to be removed.
        Returns:
        the previous value associated with the given key or null if there was previous value
        Throws:
        CacheException - if there is a problem accessing the underlying cache system

      • clear

        void clear()
           throws CacheException
        Clear all entries from the cache.
        Throws:
        CacheException - if there is a problem accessing the underlying cache system

        int size()
         throws CacheException
        Returns the number of entries in the cache.
        Returns:
        the number of entries in the cache.
        Throws:
        CacheException

        Close and release de resources for current cache instance
